roleset.name: immerse in a liquid
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class other_cos-45.4. Framenet class cause_to_be_wet. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Example with arg 2
example.text: We were soused with titan urine and sickened by the stench.

example.name: Example with arg 0
example.text: [She *1] didn't hesitate [* 1] to souse the Old Man himself with a plate of soup.

roleset.name: become drunk
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie.

example.name: temporal clause example
example.text: When everyone was soused, they play the game "I Never."
